item.title: Are Millennials political different and will not age into conservatism?

John Burn-Murdoch on Twitter

“NEW: conservatives have a Millennials problem. In both UK & US, it’s not just that Millennials aren’t voting conservative because they’re young. Every previous generation grew more conservative with age, but Millennials are not playing ball. My column: https://t.co/MyIKv5sZ4o”

URL: https://twitter.com/jburnmurdoch/status/1608746369505976323

item.title: Martin Ravallion has passed away
item.description:
Joel S. Hellman on Twitter

“So sad to hear of the tragic loss of ⁦@MartinRavallion⁩ — pioneering poverty researcher, one of the most influential economists of the ⁦@WorldBank⁩, and a respected ⁦@Georgetown⁩ professor. His contribution to our understanding of development was truly enormous.”

URL: https://twitter.com/joelhellman_SFS/status/1607764811340718084

item.title: Americans are far more likely to move to Mexico than to Canada

Heather Long on Twitter
